trans-unit.source: Use this source book to explore all the features Bloom offers with a subscription. It's a great way to try out advanced tools and layout options before upgrading.
trans-unit.target: Use this source book to explore all the features Bloom offers with a subscription. It's a great way to try out advanced tools and layout options before upgrading.

trans-unit.source: Books created with this template will include a watermark and cannot be printed, published or distributed.
trans-unit.target: Books created with this template will include a watermark and cannot be printed, published or distributed.
